generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface in the foreground and extending into the background is a road, as it is the surface on which vehicles (including the Mercedes-Benz emblem visible) would drive.
- sidewalk: The paved area adjacent to the buildings, where pedestrians are walking and where bicycles are parked, is a sidewalk, delimited from the road by bollards and curbs.
- building: The multi-story brick and glass structures with commercial signage (e.g., "tuomo", "IRIS ARNIM", "DSQUARED2") are clearly buildings.
- pole: There are several vertical poles visible, including those supporting traffic signs and possibly streetlights or other fixtures.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including directional signs ("Einbahnstraße", "PHILIPP PL"), parking signs ("P"), and a sign indicating "MITTE 289 FREIE PLÄTZE".
- vegetation: There are potted plants visible inside the storefronts, particularly near the entrance of the "tuomo" store.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk, including a group of people on the right side of the image.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the image, near the bicycles.
- bicycle: Numerous bicycles are parked in racks and on the sidewalk, particularly in the middle-left of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked along the street on the left side of the image, including a dark SUV and a red car.
